title: (02400) Hellín - 1 Calle Fortunato Arias
description: Horrible place I don't know what the original poster was thinking but there is no room to park a motorhome here , very very busy and noisy

title: (02400) Hellín - 19T Avenida de la Constitución
description: Central area, inaugurated in 2019, with all the services available and quiet to spend the night.

title: (02420) Hellín - 106 Carretera A Hellin
description: Open field next to the gas station. There were some trucks and we decided to spend the night there.

title: (02400) Hellín - 29 CM-3213
description: Stop among pines, to eat or hang out, little dam

title: (02409) Hellín - 2 Plaza Letra A
description: Agra, very quiet village to rest and fill water on the way to the Sierra del Segura, about 2 km past the Mundo River.

title: (02500) Tobarra -
description: Parking next to the sanctuary, only vans, beautiful views, nature and a very beautiful church to visit, there are drinking fountains and two public toilets that are not always open, you can walk around the area and beautiful views of the town

title: (02500) Tobarra - Cm-3215
description: Developed industrial area without development. Parking at the roadside, relatively straight at the top. No service, no bins. Internet very good. Absolutely quiet, ideal for dogs

title: (02420) Hellín - 260 CM-412
description: Recreational area Roman bridges

title: (02490) Hellín - 83 Calle Murcia
description: Next to Agramón Park. A small village in Albacete, super quiet where people are very kind. Very recommendable.

title: (02499) Estación de Agramón -
description: Beautiful place to spend the day, next to the Mundo River, where you can go hiking or take a bath in the Puente de Agramón river garden... I haven't spent the night, there is a place to park motorhomes

title: (02499) Hellín - 7 Carretera Jumilla
description: Parking for dirt trucks, large, ideal to spend the night if you are caught in this area, 50m gas station, quiet moche with some cicada with insomnia.

title: (02410) Liétor - Aldea Talave
description: A beautiful place by the lake. Requires walking 300m on a rocky path. Almost no network coverage. Can be windy but the view is great

title: (02410) Liétor - 220 Aldea Talave
description: Some spots along this road by the lake, including this one, calm and surrounded by nature. NB: not suitable for smartphone addicts; Very weak network, never continuous

title: (30440) - 2 Caserio Cenajo
description: Area to sleep and visit the area. There is no garbage collection.

title: (02652) Ontur - 297 CM-412
description: Magnificent newly opened motorhome area. Very close to the town. Right next to the pavilion and the municipal swimming pool. Thanks to the Ontur town hall for this great motorhome area.

title: (02499) Las Minas -
description: Place in the middle of nature, in the middle of the swamp, the strongest winter months are not recommended as the level of the swamp may have risen and the camping esplanade disappears or becomes too narrow, place for 2 vans maximum, too many vehicles are not recommended large and low, since the access road is somewhat steep, especially in the last 50 meters, otherwise if you are able to get here you will enjoy a beautiful place with 4G coverage, quite far from civilization.

title: (02499) Las Minas -
description: Shaded parking. No access to bathrooms, but easy access and close to nature to go to the swamp

title: (02410) Liétor - 20 Avenida la Paz
description: It is one of the few places where you can park even overnight, very quiet.

title: (02410) Liétor - 6 Calle los Pasos
description: Street not very busy in front of public building of new construction and next to rock wall, near the center and easy access to natural bathing area and hiking trails.

title: (02410) Liétor - Unnamed Road
description: Viewpoint parking on a secondary road that leads to Liétor. In the town there is no area and you can only spend the night in its streets. This place is only 5 minutes from the town, flat and you can sleep peacefully. Well parked, they fit 5 AC or more.

name: Tourist village Cañar
title: (02437) Tourist village Cañar
description: Camping very close to the swamp el cenajo, where you can fish, go kayaking, etc. Also very close to very beautiful towns like Nerpio, Letur.

title: (30420) La Hondonera -
description: A small bay right on a gravel road. View of the mountains / hills. The road is probably only used by the farmers and 4x4 tourists who own the book "Spain Offroad Roads". The driveway needs some ground clearance. Probably works without a 4x4. The train tracks are closed, so it is very quiet at night. We didn't see any other people here at the end of December.

title: (30420) Calasparra - Calle Matadero Nuevo
description: Unpaved parking space. Very quiet. Opposite is an asphalt parking lot with more than a hundred spaces. Certainly well attended on pilgrimages.

title: (30420) La Granja - C. Matadero Nuevo
description: Car park without service, from the sanctuary of La Esperenza after the town of Calasparra. Place to visit with a river in the bottom

title: (30420) Calasparra - Poblado Camping los Vientos
description: Picnic area of the sanctuary of Hope, on the banks of the Segura river. Shaded and leveled, a good area for walking, hiking, mountain biking and visiting the sanctuary (carved into the rock, impressive). It has public toilets and a bar/restaurant. Very quiet but on weekends can get crowded.

name: Camping Los Viveros
title: (30420) Camping Los Viveros
description: Camping Los Viveros Water, electricity and swimming pool included. High season. To download the grays you have to lift a lid which the owner very kindly helps you. Most plots are permanent people. Nearby you can do a simple but highly recommended rafting activity.

title: (02510) Pozo Cañada - 4642 Calle Diseminados
description: Picnic area with a beautiful hermitage of San Cristóbal, a cozy place to eat and spend the night, away from civilization

title: (02439) El Gallego - CM 3228
description: Full ground next to the road 2-3 places for vehicles not too big type Van, 2 house nearby but slightly set back with view of the forests and mountains, respect for nature please.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 93A Calle Nuestra Sr Asunción Par
title_short: (30520) Jumilla - 93A Calle Nuestra Sr Asunción Par
description: Quiet, large open area next to a school and empty field, close to a restaurant.  Short walk to town center or Mercadona.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 3 Calle Ingeniero de la Cierva
title_short: (30520) Jumilla - 3 Calle Ingeniero de la Cierva
description: Covered swimming pool parking. tall and flat. Lots of noise from the garbage trucks parked in the city's technical services premises and come out day and night.

title: (30420) Calasparra - Carr. del Santuario
description: Nice location, close to the cave church of Calasparra, in a parking lot of an archaeological site, restaurant 100 meters, with more bars & restaurants 10 minutes walk. Slept peacefully.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 0 Avenida de la Libertad
description: Vacant lot with lots of space. To see if it is sometimes busy. Good for going into town but a bit far from the center. I stayed for a few hours but I would not spend the night

title: (02129) Pozohondo - AB-409
description: Very small recreation in the direction of Albacete. No type of service, not even garbage, but well shaded.

title: (30420) Calasparra - 88 Calle Teniente Flomesta
description: We visited Calasparra for a bullfight and find this place. Bp fuel station and car/motorhome wash with laundry service and toilets. You can buy bakery products at the station (no add blue). Best place to stay at this town. Not recommending the main car park as it was noisy and full of people until like 3am.

title: (30420) Calasparra -
description: Free parking open all year round, essential to access the river and the reservoir. There are no services or shadows but it is a quiet place of great beauty. On the way down and using some stairs you can access the river and there is also a shaded esplanade and a small beach where you can soak carefully.

title: (30420) Calasparra - 3 Calle el Lavador
description: Self service laundry with coins. Open 08:00-22:00. Has washers and dryers and a machine to change euro bills into coins. Not easy to park very close with a big van. We parked at the parking spot which is on park4night on the east of town. From there it was a 7 minute walk. The bar next door opens at noon.

title: (30520) Jumilla - 19 Calle del Taller
description: This is an unmade hard standing area on the edge of an unfinished development. It was recommended by the tourist office as they are hoping to develop it as a Motorhome area. Several bodegas and a castle to visit. Plenty of bars and restaurants in this friendly town!

title: (30420) Calasparra - 17 Calle Molinos
description: Car park set back from the road, just below is another large but winged car park

title: (30530) Almadenes -
description: Cueva de la Serreta car park, next to the information booth. No services. It is in the middle of the field and the dusk, the tranquility of the night and the dawn are wonderful.

title: (02437) Socovos - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic zone. Possibility of bathing in the stream Very quiet, without lighting.

title: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 1-5 Calle Esparto
title_short: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 1-5 Calle Esparto
description: Motorhome parking in Elche de la Sierra (Albacete)

title: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 7 Paseo de la Libertad
title_short: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 7 Paseo de la Libertad
description: Parking near a park. Playground for children. Quiet after 23h. Many people are walking in the evening. There is water. Toilets are possible during the day. Without service. Nice little town.

title: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 2 Plaza Constitución
title_short: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 2 Plaza Constitución
description: In the center, only 3 places

name: Complejo Rural La Tejera
title: (02430) Complejo Rural La Tejera
description: Parking for caravans, motorhomes, camper van. It is necessary to make a reservation in advance. Entry hours from 11am to 8pm Located in a natural environment, where each area has its own electricity and water, where you can enjoy the common areas in the complex, such as a children's play area, restaurant, walking areas, swimming pool in summer season ... Located 1.5KM from Elche de la Sierra, in the center of the Sierra del Segura, where you have the facility to enjoy the surrounding towns within a few minutes.

title: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 1T Calle Bolea
title_short: (02430) Elche de la Sierra - 1T Calle Bolea
description: Solar where the City Council has left a parking for public use 24 hours

title: (02437) Socovos - CM-3217
description: Picnic area next to the stream. Very shady and cool in summer. Not illuminated.

title: (30520) - 68 Diseminado Santa Ana
description: Turn off the road onto a dirt road.  4x4 or at least a vehicle with plenty of ground clearance would be better. Then after a hundred meters there is a small area on the left, slightly sloping, a little difficult to drive on.  Then a very quiet and sheltered place. No service, but many hiking trails in the area.

name: Casas Rurales Rapia
title: (30440) Casas Rurales Rapia
description: Rapia, rural accommodation. It is an agricultural estate with 300 hectares of forest and a complex of rural houses. They have just set up an area for motorhomes under hundred-year-old pine trees, next to a pond and with all the services.

address.street: Camino de la Traviesa de la Silla, S/N

title: (30420) Pantano de Alfonso XIII - Unnamed Road
title_short: (30420) Pantano de Alfonso XIII - Unnamed Road
description:
Lonely place with great view of the lake.
There are some washes on the road, but I think it's doable up to 3.5t without all-wheel drive.
Coming from the east, I drove here via the second junction.

title: (30520) Jumilla -
description:
3 days MAX STAY. if staying longer you need to get permission from town council 

Recreational area in Santa Ana. There is a sign of camping area and parking. The place is spectacular. There are garbage containers, fountain, tables and benches and barbecues (although I do not think you can fire). The place is super quiet and there is plenty of space to park. At about 300m there is a monastery where you can visit a museum. On the side of the monastery there is another small place with a source of spring water.

title: (30520) Jumilla - Camino Viejo de Santa Ana
title_short: (30520) Jumilla - Camino Viejo de Santa Ana
description: Place in the middle of nature, 750 meters high, 4G, no water, no service. Jumillia at 10 km. Very calm

title: (30528) Fuente del Pino - 58 Aldea Fuente del Pino
title_short: (30528) Fuente del Pino - 58 Aldea Fuente del Pino
description: Quiet place to stop for a while to rest. Very calm.

title: (30530) Horno -
description: Dirt parking with good views of the peach fields. Quiet place to spend the night. Especially recommended during the peach tree flowering season (February-March) they also have a beach bar with drinks and sell products from the area.

title: (30420) Pantano de Alfonso XIII -
description: Very cool esplanade with incredible views of the reservoir. Quite flat, clean and with shady areas. Accessible to all types of vehicles on a track in good condition.

title: (30420) Calasparra - Carretera Caravaca
description: Quiet area next to the swamp. I've only seen signs forbidding bathing. several entrances on the way around the swamp.

title: (02125) Ayna - 9 Calle Suelo Ap
description: Gratuitous

title: (02125) Ayna - 16 Calle Suelo Ap
description: Surrounded by nature next to the river (waterfall) spectacular views of the town and even more at night. Eye there is a recreational area before but do not enter the ac. The site is small but there is room for 2 or 3 ac approx adjusting. bathing area in river.You have to enter the road past the town of Ayna .. from Ayna it gets complicated. The road of approx is narrow but you get there without problem .. some tree touches a little.

title: (30420) Calasparra - Carretera Caravaca
description: Wonderful parking lot overlooking the swamp, which offers incredible views. It is quiet even on the weekend, and if it makes a clear niche the night sky is not polluted at all. There are also no mosquitoes.

title: (02125) Ayna - 39 Avenida Manuel Carrera
description: Place next to the river in the town of Ayna where the film was shot (dawn is not small). You can spend the night there and spend the day there. Picnic tables. Entrance a little narrow, only the small motorhome then pass.

title: (02430) Elche de la Sierra -
description: Picnic area next to the road, we spent the night in the place, since it is quiet and you can park without problem. There are some fig trees that isolate you a bit from the road, there is not much traffic of cars so it is not annoying to rest.

title: (30530) Almadenes -
description: Leveled esplanade, perfect to go up to the sector to climb. We slept here three days and no problem. the only thing the forester told us was not to leave garbage as usual. you have to take care of the environment. no services or trash nearby.

title: (02692) Pétrola - 27 Calle Olmo
description: Source for clean water recharge

title: (30530) Cieza - Unnamed Road
description: Breakdown for the night by the river

title: (02692) Pétrola - Unnamed Road
description: Salt water bath. Impressive sunset. There is no service.

title: (30440) El Cobo -
description: Following the road that goes from Moratalla to Calasparra you will find approximately 1km (small booth and sign that indicates it) a path to the left that is the beginning of the path that goes to the Bolvonegro Strait, normally you park on the side of the road and enter Walking, we decided to enter with the car to see if we could advance a section of the road and we found this wonderful place to spend the night, right at the next sign where it explains the charms of the route, next to the bridge. quiet place next to a stream. To do the route you have to walk across the bridge and follow the path indications, always trying to walk next to the river, the route and the landscape are beautiful and you can take a bath in the river, you must pass along an orchard and a farm of making honey and follow the river, the end of the route is the Bolvonegro Strait, which is beautiful, although it is not recommended to swim in it

title: (30530) Cieza - Paseo Ribereno
description: Drinking water source. Next to the bathing area.

title: (30530) Cieza - Paseo Ribereno
description: Small parking in a quiet place beautiful surroundings to walk along the river, has no service.

title: (30440) Moratalla - Unnamed Road
description: Surrounded by mountains and hiking trails.

title: (30510) Arabí -
description: Quiet parking lot. Starting point for hikes on Monte Arabí. No cell phone reception.

title: (30530) Cieza - 18 Calle Calvario
description: Quiet parking in a nice place near the center

title: (30442) Moratalla - 204 Calle Molino Benizar
description: Parking area at the foot of the Castle of Benizár. Stream with fountain, nice area. There is no lighting. Very calm.

title: (30510) Arabí -
description: Ecological vineyards and winery. 500000 meters of vineyards for walks. Parking for 4 motorhomes only. Organic wine tasting. Observations of work in vineyards. Learning wine making. Barbecue service. Short stays from 3 to 7 days. Optional excursion to Mount El Arabi - World Heritage Site - protected by UNESCO. Only visits booked online. Prohibited entry with children and dogs, pets.

title: (30420) Cehegín - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect for resting or eating, even for sleeping. Very quiet, there may be fishermen.

title: (02434) Letur - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place among pine trees to rest or picnic without services, but nearby is the town of Letur and Socovos, both with charm and hiking trails and natural pools.

title: (30530) Cieza - 14 Calle Juan de la Cierva
title_short: (30530) Cieza - 14 Calle Juan de la Cierva
description: Ample space to park and see the city. Buses and trucks. I imagine you can sleep

title: (30420) Valentín -
description: A few spots scattered along the very little traveled road around the lake, including this one. With access to water via a small path 20 meters below.

title: (30530) Cieza - Camino de la Atalaya
description: Wide, very quiet and sheltered place to park and spend the night. Great to go to the visitor center of the Muslim city of Siyasa, apparently recently restored. The recommended night visit. You can climb the zigzag path to the mountain at the foot of this place, the peak of Saraceno. In short, a very good option to enjoy this environment.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Corral-Rubio
title: (02693) Área de Autocaravanas Corral-Rubio
description: Motorhome area with 15 parking spaces. Very new and attached to a public pool with a beach bar. Close to the soccer field and a step away from the town with all services.

title: (02434) Letur - Camino de los Pradillos
description: Parking 5 minutes from the Letur waterfall, without services, very quiet, somewhat uneven ground.

title: (30439) Cehegín - RM-B20
description: Nice place at the foot of the Argos reservoir. You can't hear a car from here, just nature.

title: (30529) Jumilla - 8 Diseminado Estrecho de Marin
description: Picnic area night possible wine cellar face

title: (02434) Letur - s/n calle huerta de la mina
title_short: (02434) Letur - s/n calle huerta de la mina
description: City car park. level area. Enough space. Don't worry. It does not have any services, but nearby is the crossing with a supermarket and a bakery with everything great. The town is wonderful. The area is very safe. Thanks to the town hall for allowing us to spend the night in this wonderful town.

address.street: s/n calle huerta de la mina

title: (30510) Yecla - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking near Cantos de Visera. there is a cool cave and hiking trails. no services.

title: (02434) Letur - Avd. Guardia Civil
description: A very good FINDE getaway

title: (30440) Moratalla - km 14 Carretera de Calasparra
description: Water at the fuel station. Please note: the tab is located on the side of the road on a yellow pole. It is NOT the one at the air/water station. Very hight pressure.

title: (02434) Letur - 4 Calle Proyecto F
description: Small wasteland next to a house. Level area, next to the crossing, but with enough distance to avoid the noise of passing vehicles and shops opening shutters very early. Very close is the crossing, with a supermarket and a typical village bakery with everything great. The site itself is very secure, surrounded by homes.

title: (02434) Letur - 31 Carretera Calasparra
description: Street parking very close to Coviran supermarket. Quiet area and near the historic center.

title: (30442) Casa Requena - 1 Partida Casa Requena
description: Quiet area without services. At the entrance of the town. Restaurant availability 1 kilometer away. Not illuminated.

title: (30442) Charán -
description: Close to the road but a bit appart from it. It's right in front of the way to go to a waterfall, so there might be people parking to do the hike in the morning.

name: Camping la Puerta
title: (30440) Camping la Puerta
description:
Camping la Puerta

 It has all the amenities and services of a luxury campsite, and combines the delights of the Mediterranean climate and the abundant nature of a natural and unique place in the region of Murcia. Large camp area with plots ranging from 50 to 120 m2, electrical connection (10 amps) and TV socket.

title: (30440) Moratalla - 66 Calle Inocencio Rodríguez
description: Beautiful viewpoint at the end of a cut and sloping road, on a hill, in the middle of a pine forest. The road ends in a wide and flat space to park well, and from there starts a small walkway to the viewpoint, with good views of Moratalla and the castle. Super quiet and very beautiful place, with wastebasket, containers and no passage of people. Be careful, although it is tempting and could be accessed by vehicle, you can NOT park at the viewpoint itself. The cleaners came to tell me to park in the driveway.

title: (02434) Letur - 16 Calle Poligono Industrial
description: Parking in an industrial area, behind a cheese factory and very close to a gas station. The place is not pretty, but it's just for sleeping and it's also very quiet. Good alternative to sleep near Letur. Inside the town it is difficult to maneuver with the motorhome.

title: (30440) Moratalla - 49 Carretera de Caravaca
description: Right next to the gas station there is a dirt plot where we were able to spend the night. Right next door there is a gas station with a cafeteria, restaurant and some shop. It has a tap in the corner that you can use to refill water, and empty the gray ones in the open laundry room, you can also hose down the motorhome, have a drink at the gas station or nearby bars. A quiet and peaceful place, considering that the main road passes next to it.

title: (02434) Letur - Km1 Carretera Nerpio
description: Service area, where you are allowed to fill water for free but you cannot empty either gray or black water. Gasoline is well priced.

title: (30440) Moratalla - 1 Calle Antonio Machado
description: It is an esplanade of land. I spent one night from Sunday to Monday. Peaceful place.

title: (30440) Moratalla - Unnamed Road
description: Esplanade in the middle of the mountain, not suitable for heavy vehicles, but for small vans, just next to it are the Somogil baths, some impressive pools to soak in

name: Parque de las Norias
title: (30550) Parque de las Norias
description: Good place to park and do the route of the Norias.

title: (30550) Abarán - 187 Avenida de la Constitución
description: Large esplanade of land for parking, ideal for doing the Ruta de las Norias and for visiting the town.

title: (30520) Jumilla - Unnamed Road
description: After 1 km of track, just after the exit, small horizontal esplanade next to the track, 50 m from the pass on the right. If you see a mini rikiki chapel, it's 100 m before!

title: (02695) Villar de Chinchilla -
description: Dirt road that has some places where you can park with a 7.5m AC without problem. In the middle of nowhere, next to a very quiet road that has no traffic at night. We slept very well, sheltered by the oaks.

title: (30440) Moratalla - Santuario Casa Cristo
description: Parking in the middle of the mountain next to the Casa Cristo Sanctuary. Ideal place to see the stars. There is a water source to stock up and a bar / restaurant. Maximum tranquility at 1000 meters of altitude.

title: (30440) Benamor - Unnamed Road
description: Very close to another car park but this one more isolated, flat and with views. There are no services.

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 2 Avenida de Levante
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 2 Avenida de Levante
description: Really convenient place to clean your motorhome. Our 2,85 high van fitted in the roofed cubicals but behind the gasstation you’ll also find a cubical without a roof. Downsite though that there was no broom, just a pistol. What made me decide to add this was the really convenient wall next to it which you can easily climb which allows you to clean the top of your van ergo your solar panels. After a few weeks parking next to the sea, that was more then welcome!

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 3 Calle Camilo José Cela
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 3 Calle Camilo José Cela
description: Parking at the top next to the castle. Place overlooking the La Mancha plain.

title: (30540) Blanca - 15 Calle San José
description: Parking at the side of the road with shade to make a stop and rest. I would not use it to sleep. Useful considering that we have barely found official rest areas on the nearby highway.

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 9I Calle Fuente
description: Very clean, spacious place with well-made supply and disposal. No electricity, WiFi only in the old town at the tourist information. Concrete drain with channel for gray water, spatially separate water connections for drinking water and rinsing water. Separate waste disposal possible at the top of the stairs, residual waste container at the disposal station. Beautiful old town with old castle. Well restored with super views over the countryside. Easily doable on foot, but various stairs. Various restaurants and tapas bars in the city. Warning: Market on every Thursday morning, area partially restricted.

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 28 Calle San Cristóbal
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - 28 Calle San Cristóbal
description: Small parking that serves as a view of the village 3 parking spaces with beautiful views just above the communal area free

title: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - Camino de Santa Fé
title_short: (02520) Chinchilla de Monte-Aragón - Camino de Santa Fé
description: Parking with picnic area and a grove around it. Quiet to eat and hang out in the countryside.

title: (02696) Caserío Alhama - Autovia de Alicante
description: Gas station next to the highway. Suitable for resting or spending the night during the trip

title: (30540) Blanca -
description: Place next to the river, great views. Easy 1.5km hiking trail. very quiet place

title: (30540) Blanca - 17 Calle Frutas de Levante
description: Central asphalt parking to see the town, we made a stop here for kayaking activity, down the Segura river. As it is in the same town, you have pharmacies, supermarkets, coffee shops ... and the river to take a bath a few meters away. We do not stay but you can stay overnight. The entrance to the car park is wide, it has no maximum height, we are 6.20 long and we enter the squares well. Silent. Ideal for a stop to rest or some activity of descent of the river or hiking area.

title: (30540) Blanca - 2 Carretera Ojos
description: Open next to the center of white .. to be disconnected to., Next to the center ..

title: (30540) Blanca - 7 Avenida Río Segura
description: In this street you can park to be next to the company that makes the rafting trips.

title: (30540) Blanca - 73 Avenida Río Segura
description: Quiet and shaded parking

name: Estación de Servicio Repsol
title: (02520) Estación de Servicio Repsol
description: LPG at repsol

title: (30540) Blanca - 5 Calle Alto de Bayna
description: Picnic site, without service, you can even spend the night, beautiful setting, very bucolic and pleasant. Warning processionary caterpillars. Make sure you check Google maps before following as the route is better accessed by looking on the map!!

title: (30540) Blanca - 237 Diseminado Huerta Bayna
description: Beautiful park up on the lagoon. Spaces for 5/6 campers

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 43 Calle Calvario Bajo
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 43 Calle Calvario Bajo
description: Beautiful viewpoint and picnic area of the Virgen de la Reja hermitage, at the top of the mountain. The perfect place to park and spend the night in Caravaca, with extraordinary views of the town, the sanctuary and the mountains. There are several stone tables to eat, lots of trees, and a couple of containers. Ample space to park on flat ground. The civil guard sometimes passes but they don't say anything. Super quiet place with little influx of people, someone sometimes comes to the viewpoint and little else. Easy access across town, on streets wide enough for a standard motorhome or van. Caution: strangely, the gps will not take you to the hermitage itself, it will indicate the destination a little lower, as if it could not be accessed, but you can continue up without problem. Open 24 hrs.

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 46 Calle Barrio Nuevo Bajo
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 46 Calle Barrio Nuevo Bajo
description: Nice flat place with nice view of caravaca. Lovely quiet night.

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 9 Calle del Barrio Nuevo Centro
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 9 Calle del Barrio Nuevo Centro
description: Small dirt car park, fairly flat, with easy access. Perfect to spend one or two nights and visit caravaca.

title: (30430) Cehegín - Calle Cuesta del Olivar
description: Cehegín fairground, only can not be used in parties (from September 8 to 14), very good views of the old town and near the center

name: Maravilla Parking | Autocaravanas, caravanas y campers
title: (30430) Maravilla Parking | Autocaravanas, caravanas y campers
title_short: (30430) Maravilla Parking | Autocaravanas, caravanas y campers
description: Parking with services for emptying and filling water and electricity, all included in the price, WC and Showers Module, covered picnic area, open 24 hours, Gas Station and self-service laundry, children's playground, views of the Old Town. Recommended visit to Cehegin, a very picturesque town, named "Rural Wonder of Spain 2019".

title: (30430) Cehegín - 28 Calle Gran Vía
description: Flat parking near the center .. very busy area

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz -
description: Spectacular plot, completely fenced in the Caravaca orchard just 800 meters from the urban center and historic center. In addition, it is very close to the northwest greenway, which is part of the Camino de la Cruz.

title: (30430) Cehegín - 45 Calle Poniente
description: Parking very close to the center to walk visit the historic center with beautiful houses, go through the town hall to see its staircase and the boardroom, very interesting, information and tourism next door, eat the menu in the restaurant the Sun very good and good Price will not disappoint you. Worth a visit.

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 8 Calle Pabellón
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 8 Calle Pabellón
description: This was a perfect  spot close to the old city and sites. A bit of music  noise from kids in a parked car but quiet  after 11pm. Beautiful  views and we'll worth a stopover.

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 4 Calle Rambla
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 4 Calle Rambla
description: 13 places, some peripheral shade, flat, quiet, near Fire Station, views of basilica and town, with grey, black and potable water. New and spotless.

title: (30430) Cehegín - 1 Calle Alfonso X el Sabio
title_short: (30430) Cehegín - 1 Calle Alfonso X el Sabio
description: Fairground of the town, quite calm (some car looking for shelter at night) very level. access to adjoining playground.

title: (30430) Cehegín - 5 Calle Beata Madre Maravillas
description: Parking next to the large via de Cehegin in the center of the city

title: (30430) Cehegín - 4 Calle Huerto Ródenas
description: Central, quiet, near a gas station, beautiful views. 5 minutes from the historic center of downtown. Ideal to spend the night. There is no sign of any kind. I recommend it.

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 75 Calle Puentecilla
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 75 Calle Puentecilla
description: Large esplanade next to a soccer field and at the foot of the holy city, walking are 5 minutes to the sanctuary, the parking is level we stayed both day and overnight and everything was very quiet.

title: (30430) Cehegín - Calle de los Electricistas
description: Parking with a beautiful view of this beautiful city. Only 50 meters from the local police and about 500 meters from the tourist office. Recommended tour of the old town and tapas in the old town. Easy access from the highway. About 100 meters from the greenway that connects Cehegín with Caravaca and Bullas

title: (30610) Ricote - RM-B15
description: Mirador del Alberque. lovely views over Ricote and on a nice 10k circular walk. The track to the Mirador is sound but a bit lumpy. Once at the top the parking is flat.

title: (02691) Bonete - 15 Calle José Luis
description: A stop along the way to eat. Shaded next to park, with picnic tables.

title: (30410) Caravaca de la Cruz - 4 Camino de Mayrena
title_short: (30410) Caravaca de la Cruz - 4 Camino de Mayrena
description: New car park with portable toilets and a wide esplanade between downtown Caravaca and the Fuentes del Marqués.

title: (30430) Cehegín - 146 Carretera de Murcia
description: Cehegin Motorhome Service Area Cehegingas offers an emptying area for gray, black and water loads. Go to the store to collect the key to unlock the padlock at the tap Additional services LPG supermarket refills Propane and butane bottles, Adblue expenses Laundry Restaurant and grills Car wash

title: (30610) Ricote - 2 Calle F
description: Large fenced gravel lot next to a sports hall. Level and calm. Lemon trees all around. Water disposal and drinking water against brands that are available in every store. The box looks a bit dented though. Bakery, shops and very good restaurants! Place with a lot of history. The area around is terrific and the 360 degree view makes up for the simple place!

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 16 Avenida de la Constitución
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - 16 Avenida de la Constitución
description: Washing machines from 4 euro and dryers from 2 euro, nice and clean place. You need to pay in coins but there is money change machine.

title: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - Cam. de Mayrena
title_short: (30400) Caravaca de la Cruz - Cam. de Mayrena
description: Parking day and night at the entrance to natural area night lighting

title: (30194) Mula - Unnamed Road
description: Nice area to park under the pines and swim in the pools of the river. There is a spot 50 meters away and another, slightly larger, about 20 minutes away. Make the GPS better on Yechar and follow the signs for Fuente Caputa.

title: (30189) Bullas - Carretera Chaparral
description: Parking and rest area of the greenway of the Northwest at the height of the municipality of Bullas. There is shade, table with benches and garbage containers. This stretch of the greenway is beautiful in spring when the cercis bloom. Ideal for walking and cycling routes. I don't know if it's allowed to sleep.

title: (30194) Mula - Unnamed Road
description: Outdoor parking in the heart of the Mula climbing sites

title: (30180) Bullas - 6 Calle Blas Infante
description: Parking in a dirt area with a high-pressure water source and a nearby supermarket. You can spend the night and it is close to the town and a few meters from the wine museum in Bullas. The place is quiet to spend both the day and the night.

title: (30180) Bullas - 10 Calle Camino Del Prado
description: Parking for the night and visit the city sol en gravilloñs

title: (30430) Cehegín - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with 3 tables and shade. There is room for several vans. Fire prohibited. Hiking and mountain biking trails.

title: (02008) Albacete - Avenida de España, 73
description:
Free area with 8 designated motorhome pitches but the car park has space for many more. Firm ground level. Point with service: fresh water, gray water, black water. 3 km from the city center.
The water fill is smooth with no threads for a fitting.

title: (30194) Mula - viaducto embalse de La Cierva
title_short: (30194) Mula - viaducto embalse de La Cierva
description: Secluded parking at the foot of the reservoir. Very quiet compared to those that are at the foot of the road, usually frequented at night by young people from the town (alcohol, parties, noise ...). It has high rocks in which to have beautiful views of the entire reservoir.

title: (30180) Bullas - 25 Calle del Río
description: Salto de Usero public parking with many possibilities.

name: Camping le Rafa
title: (30180) Camping le Rafa
description: Plots of tranquility and level. Pool.

title: (30194) Mula - Embalse de la Cierva
description: Small gravel footprint about 150m from the bank of the reservoir! Super calm and nice view! The reservoir is wonderful to walk on, our dogs had great bathing fun in the crystal-clear water! The picnic area marked opposite is max. passable for small camping vehicles! The liner given here can also be used!

title: (30189) - 10 Diseminado la Atalaya
description: Parking of the Watchtower, in slope. There are good views of Monte del Castellar and Aceniche valley to one side and the town from the other. Ideal for van, perhaps for motorhome is not recommended. Very quiet place There are no services.

title: (30430) Cehegín - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of the Sierra de Burete, many hiking, trail and mountain biking trails. Surrounded by nature. Parking behind the Coto de las Maravillas mountain chalet. 100% calm

title: (02002) Albacete - 1 Calle de Muñoz Seca
description: Self service laundrette. 3 washing machines and 2 dryers.

title: (30430) Burete - Unnamed Road
description: A very quiet place for 1-2 camper van with beautiful views. Beware of a long gravel road with steep rocky parts.

name: alojamientos rurales Cloan
title: (30180) alojamientos rurales Cloan
description:
Rural motorhome, complex of rural houses, with a small area for cars/caravans in a privileged environment, in the middle of nature, ideal for disconnecting, resting, hiking routes, visiting incredible places and enjoying a swim in our wonderful swimming pool, soccer field room, hunting park, park with swings, available with a refrigerator, sink and hot water shower included in the price. Payment washing machine. Concrete parking, 3 kilometers from Bullas, 10 minutes to Caravaca de la Cruz. You can also enjoy a great swim in the Salto del Usero. TO STAY OR RESERVATION, CALL THE PHONE.
Prices:
-July/August/September, Long Weekends and Holidays
-The rest of the year
-1 person alone all year round: single rate

title: (30180) Bullas - Diseminado Sendero Fuente Mula
description: Parking next to a swimming area. Fairly quiet, the road is a bit busy but nothing more. Not far from the salto del usero on foot.
